course_recommendation.recommendation_reasoning: The website is for an Information Technology institute (IIIT-Delhi) with departments, programs, and research heavily focused on Computer Science, Electronics, AI, Data Science, Computational Biology, and related engineering fields, indicating a strong technical and programming orientation.
